passage_text: Tweet. [ 3 syll. ar-pa-na, arp-ana ] The baby girl name Arpana is pronounced as aaRPae-Naa- †. Arpana's language of origin is Sanskrit and it is used mainly in the Indian language. The name means 'dedicated one'. Arpana is rare as a baby girl name. It is not listed in the top 1000. Baby names that sound like Arpana include Arpeni (Armenian), Arpine (Armenian), Aerfen (Welsh), Orphne, Orphnee, Orphney, Orphnie, and Orphny.
